title: Prawn and chicken sandwich
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, thinly sliced', '1/2 roasted chicken breast, diced', '100g prawns, cooked', 'salt, to taste', 'ground white pepper, to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '2 slices bread, of your choice', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese']
